personalInfo.name: Anudeep Sri Bathina
personalInfo.title: Lead Data Scientist | AI Architect
personalInfo.summary: Lead Data Scientist with 9+ years of experience building scalable AI systems, LLM/RAG solutions, and production-grade data platforms. Invited speaker at Berlin School of Business and Innovation (BSBI) Café Scientifique (AI in Business, Jun 4, 2021) and guest speaker for academic/industry programs including an STTP on Machine Learning Fundamentals (Dec 3, 2024). Author/contributor to CRC Press / Taylor & Francis publications and active mentor via ADPList and Topmate.

experience.description: Architecting enterprise GenAI solutions and LLM systems. Leading development of Python-based parsers and automated interpretation models. Overseeing API deployments using FastAPI and optimizing retrieval systems with Azure Vector Search and Cosmos DB.
Directed ML engineering teams to build data pipelines and predictive models. Recognized for high-impact delivery and technical leadership in scaling data products.
Engineered scalable PySpark pipelines resulting in measurable performance improvements. Developed client-focused interfaces and optimized database queries for complex datasets.

experience.name: Smart Portfolio with AI Chat
experience.description: A Next.js portfolio featuring a RAG-based AI chatbot capable of answering questions about my professional background, deployed to production.
Led cloud data migration projects and implemented predictive analytics models; specialized in automated data migration and visualization of key business insights.

education.description: Graduate research in computer vision (YOLOv8 and ResNet-50). Focus on advanced algorithms and applied AI.
Foundation in Computer Science and Engineering; involvement in robotics projects and technical societies.
